text: Kallanum Polisum is a 1992 Indian Malayalam film, directed by I. V. Sasi, starring Mukesh and Manoj K. Jayan in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/userreview_kallanum-polisum-.htm ==Cast== * Mukesh as P. C. Prabhakaran K. * Sindhuja as SI Asha * Roopashree as Indhu * Manoj K. Jayan as Vadival Vasu * Ragini as Soudamini * Beena Antony as Stella * Innocent as Pattathil Kaimal * KPAC Lalitha as Gouriamma * Augustine as Nalinan * Kanakalatha as Devaki * Kuthiravattam Pappu as H. C. Narayana Pilla * Mamukkoya as P. C. Abdulla /Abdukka * Usharani as Dakshayaniamma * Sankaradi as Madhava Kurup * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as SI Kuryakose * Ravikumar as Babychan Muthalali * K. R. Valsala * Janardanan * M. G. Soman * N. L. Balakrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by I. V. Sasi
title: Kallanum Polisum
